name: 罗伯特·J·范德格拉夫
bio_short: 美国物理学家和工程师。他发明了“范德格拉夫起电机”，一种能够产生极高电压（数百万伏特）的设备，并将其用作早期“粒子加速器”的电源，以推动核物理研究。
bio_short_en: An American physicist and engineer. He invented the 'Van de Graaff generator', a device capable of producing extremely high voltages (millions of volts), which was used as a power supply for early 'particle accelerators' to advance nuclear physics.
